name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Item 1 Business Business Overview Icahn Enterprises L.P. ("Icahn Enterprises") is a master limited partnership formed in Delaware on February 17, 1987 and headquartered in Sunny Isles Beach, Florida.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We are a diversified holding company owning subsidiaries currently engaged in the following continuing operating businesses: Investment, Energy, Automotive, Food Packaging, Real Estate, Home Fashion and Pharma.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: References to "we," "our" or "us" herein include Icahn Enterprises and its subsidiaries, unless the context otherwise requires.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Icahn Enterprises owns a 99% limited partner interest in Icahn Enterprises Holdings L.P. ("Icahn Enterprises Holdings").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Icahn Enterprises Holdings and its subsidiaries own substantially all of our assets and liabilities and conduct substantially all of our operations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Icahn Enterprises G.P.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Inc. ("Icahn Enterprises GP"), which is indirectly owned and controlled by Mr. Carl C. Icahn, owns a 1% general partner interest in each of Icahn Enterprises and Icahn Enterprises Holdings as of December 31, 2024, representing an aggregate 1.99% general partner interest in Icahn Enterprises Holdings and us.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn and his affiliates owned approximately 86% of our outstanding depositary units as of December 31, 2024.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We conduct and plan to continue to conduct our activities in such a manner as not to be deemed an investment company under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended (the "Investment Company Act").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Therefore, no more than 40% of our total assets can be invested in investment securities, as such term is defined in the Investment Company Act.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, we do not invest or intend to invest in securities as our primary business.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We structure and intend to continue structuring our investments to be taxed as a partnership rather than as a corporation under the applicable publicly traded partnership rules of the Internal Revenue Code, as amended.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Business Strategy and Core Strengths The Icahn Strategy Across all of our businesses, our success is based on a simple formula: we seek to find undervalued companies in the Graham & Dodd tradition, a methodology for valuing stocks that primarily looks for deeply depressed prices.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: However, while the typical Graham & Dodd value investor purchases undervalued securities and waits for results, we often become actively involved in the companies we target.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: That activity may involve a broad range of approaches, from influencing the management of a target to take steps to improve shareholder value, to acquiring a controlling interest or outright ownership of the target company in order to implement changes that we believe are required to improve its business, and then operating and expanding that business.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: This activism has typically brought about very strong returns over the years.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Today, we are a diversified holding company owning subsidiaries engaged in seven diversified reporting segments.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As of December 31, 2024, through our Investment segment, we have significant positions in various investments, which include Southwest Gas Holdings, Inc. (SWX), American Electric Power Company, Inc. (AEP), Caesars Entertainment Inc. (CZR), International Flavors and Fragrances Inc. (IFF) and Bausch Health Companies, Inc. (BHC).

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Several of our operating businesses started out as investment positions in debt or equity securities, held either directly by us or Mr. Icahn.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Those positions ultimately resulted in control or complete ownership of the target company.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: For example, in 2012, we acquired a controlling interest in CVR Energy, Inc. (''CVR Energy''), which started out as a position in our Investment segment and is now an operating subsidiary that comprises our Energy segment.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The acquisition of CVR Energy, like our other operating subsidiaries, reflects our opportunistic approach to value creation, through which returns may be obtained by, among other things, promoting change through minority positions at targeted

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: companies in our Investment segment or by acquiring control of those target companies that we believe we could run more profitably ourselves.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: During the next several years, we see a favorable opportunity to follow an activist strategy that centers on the purchase of target stock and the subsequent removal of any barriers that might interfere with a friendly purchase offer from a strong buyer.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Alternatively, in appropriate circumstances, we or our subsidiaries may become the buyer of target companies, adding them to our portfolio of operating subsidiaries, thereby expanding our operations through such opportunistic acquisitions.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We believe that the companies that we target for our activist activities are undervalued for many reasons, often including inept management.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Unfortunately for the individual investor, in particular, and the economy, in general, many poor management teams and boards of directors are often unaccountable and very difficult to remove.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Unlike the individual investor, we have the wherewithal to purchase companies that we feel we can operate more effectively than incumbent management.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, through our Investment segment, we are in a position to pursue our activist strategy by purchasing stock or debt positions and trying to promulgate change through a variety of activist approaches, ranging from speaking and negotiating with boards of directors and Chief Executive Officers ("CEOs") to proxy fights, tender offers and acquiring control.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We work diligently to enhance value for all shareholders and we believe that the best way to do this is to make underperforming management teams and Boards of Directors accountable or to replace them.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Chairman of the Board of Directors of our general partner, Carl C. Icahn, has been an activist investor since 1980.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn believes that the current environment continues to be conducive to activism.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We often find investment opportunities when companies execute value destructive acquisitions or fail to unlock their own "hidden jewels" through separation transactions.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Companies also find themselves listening to the advice of conflicted advisors and pursue complex, costly and never-ending litigation when acceptable quick fixes can be found.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Management teams often fail to improve their operations and profitability, relying on lax oversight from an overly friendly board of directors.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: It is our belief that our strategy will continue to produce strong results into the future.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We believe that the strong cash flow and asset coverage from our operating subsidiaries will allow us to maintain a strong balance sheet and ample liquidity.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Core Strengths We believe that our core strengths include: identifying and acquiring undervalued assets and businesses, often through the purchase of distressed securities; increasing value through management, financial or other operational changes; and managing complex legal, regulatory or financial issues, which may include bankruptcy or insolvency, environmental, zoning, permitting and licensing issues.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The key elements of our business strategy include the following:

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Capitalize on Growth Opportunities in our Existing Businesses.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We believe that we have developed a strong portfolio of businesses with experienced management teams.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We may expand our existing businesses if appropriate opportunities are identified, as well as use our established businesses as a platform for additional acquisitions in the same or related areas.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Drive Accountability and Financial Discipline in the Management of our Business.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our CEO is accountable directly to our Board of Directors of our general partner, including the Chairman, Carl C. Icahn, and has day-to-day responsibility, in consultation with our Chairman, for general oversight of our business segments.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We continually evaluate our operating subsidiaries with a view towards maximizing value and cost efficiencies, bringing an owner's perspective to our operating businesses.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In each of these businesses, we assemble senior management teams with the expertise to run their businesses and boards of directors to oversee the management of those businesses.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Each management team is responsible for the day-to-day operations of its businesses and directly accountable to its board of directors.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Seek to Acquire Undervalued Assets.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We intend to continue to make investments in businesses that we believe are undervalued and have potential for growth.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We also seek to capitalize on investment opportunities arising from market inefficiencies, economic or market trends that have not been identified and reflected in market value, or complex or special situations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Certain opportunities may arise from companies that experience disappointing financial results, liquidity or capital needs, lowered credit ratings, revised industry forecasts or legal complications.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We may acquire businesses or assets directly or we may establish an ownership position through the purchase of debt or equity securities in the open market or in privately negotiated transactions.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Use Activism to Unlock Value.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As described above, we become actively involved in companies in which we invest.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Such activism may involve a broad range of activities, from trying to influence management in a proxy fight, to taking outright control of a company in order to bring about the change we think is required to unlock value.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The key is flexibility, permanent capital and the willingness and ability to have a long-term investment horizon.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Business Description Icahn Enterprises began as American Real Estate Partners L.P. in 1987 and currently operates a portfolio of seven diversified reporting segments.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: With the exception of our Investment segment, our operating segments primarily comprise independently operated businesses that we have obtained a controlling interest in through execution of our business strategy.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our Investment segment derives revenues from gains and losses from investment transactions.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our other operating segments derive revenues principally from net sales of various products, primarily within our Energy and Automotive segments, which together accounted for the significant majority of our consolidated net sales for each of the three years in the period ended December 31, 2024.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our other operating segments' revenues are also derived through various other revenue streams which primarily consists of automotive services and real estate leasing operations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The majority of our consolidated revenues are derived from customers in the United States.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our Food Packaging segment accounted for the majority of our consolidated revenues derived from customers outside the United States.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Holding Company We seek to invest our available cash and cash equivalents in liquid investments with a view to enhancing returns as we continue to assess further acquisitions of, or investments in, operating businesses.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As of December 31, 2024, we had investments with a fair market value of approximately $2.7 billion in the Investment Funds, as defined below.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Investment Our Investment segment is comprised of various private investment funds ("Investment Funds") in which we have general partner interests and through which we invest our proprietary capital.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As general partner, we provide investment advisory and certain administrative and back-office services to the Investment Funds but do not provide such services to any other entities, individuals or accounts.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We and certain of Mr. Icahn's family members and affiliates are the only investors in the Investment Funds.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Interests in the Investment Funds are not offered to outside investors.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Investment Strategy The investment strategy of the Investment Funds is set and led by Mr. Icahn.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds seek to acquire securities in companies that trade at a discount to inherent value as determined by various metrics, including replacement cost, break-up value, cash flow and earnings power and liquidation value.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds utilize a process-oriented, research-intensive, value-based investment approach.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: This approach generally involves three critical steps: (i) fundamental credit, valuation and capital structure analysis; (ii) intense legal and tax analysis of fulcrum issues such as litigation and regulation that often affect valuation; and (iii) combined business valuation analysis and legal and tax review to establish a strategy for gaining an attractive risk-adjusted investment position.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: This approach focuses on exploiting market dislocations or misjudgments that may result from market euphoria, litigation, complex contingent liabilities, corporate malfeasance and weak corporate governance, general economic conditions or market cycles and complex and inappropriate capital structures.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds often act as activist investors ready to take the steps necessary to seek to unlock value, including through tender offers, proxy contests and demands for management accountability.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds may employ a number of strategies and are permitted to invest across a variety of industries and types of securities, including long and short equities, long and short bonds, bank debt and other corporate obligations, options, swaps and other derivative instruments thereof, risk arbitrage and capital structure arbitrage and other special situations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds invest a material portion of their capital in publicly traded equity and debt securities of companies that they believe to be undervalued by the marketplace.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Investment Funds often take significant positions in the companies in which they invest.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Income Our Investment segment's income or loss is driven by the amount of funds allocated to the Investment Funds and the performance of the underlying investments in the Investment Funds.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Funds allocated to the Investment Funds are based on the net contributions and redemptions by our Holding Company, by Mr. Icahn and his affiliates and by Brett Icahn.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Affiliate Investments We and Mr. Icahn, along with the Investment Funds, have entered into a covered affiliate agreement, which was amended on March 31, 2011, pursuant to which Mr. Icahn agreed (on behalf of himself and certain of his affiliates, excluding Icahn Enterprises, and subsidiaries) to be bound by certain restrictions on their investments in any assets that we deem suitable for the Investment Funds, other than government and agency bonds and cash equivalents, unless otherwise approved by our audit committee.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, Mr. Icahn and such affiliates continue to have the right to co-invest with the Investment Funds.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: We have no interest in, nor do we generate any income from, any such co-investments, which have been and may continue to be substantial.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Energy We conduct our Energy segment through our majority owned subsidiary, CVR Energy, Inc. ("CVR Energy"), along with a 2% interest in common units of CVR Partners, LP held outside of CVR Energy.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy is headquartered in Sugar Land, Texas.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy is a reporting company under the Exchange Act and files annual, quarterly and current reports, proxy statements and other information with the SEC that are publicly available.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy is a diversified holding company primarily engaged in the petroleum refining and marketing businesses, the renewable fuels businesses as well as in the nitrogen fertilizer manufacturing and distribution businesses through its holdings in CVR Partners, LP, a publicly traded limited partnership ("CVR Partners").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy is an independent petroleum refiner and marketer of high value transportation fuels primarily in the form of gasoline, diesel, jet fuel and distillates.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The renewables business refines renewable feedstocks, such as soybean oil, corn oil, and other related renewable feedstocks, into renewable diesel, and markets renewable products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Partners produces and markets nitrogen fertilizers in the form of urea ammonium nitrate ("UAN") and ammonia.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy holds 100% of the general partner interest and approximately 37% of the outstanding common units of CVR Partners as of December 31, 2024.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As of December 31, 2024, we owned approximately 66% of the total outstanding common stock of CVR Energy and 2% of the outstanding common units of CVR Partners.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our Energy segment's net sales for the years ended December 31, 2024, 2023 and 2022 represented approximately 83%, 83% and 81%, respectively, of our consolidated net sales, primarily from the sale of its petroleum products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Products, Raw Materials, Supply and Customers CVR Energy's refining business has the capability to process a variety of crude oil blends.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Its oil refineries in Coffeyville, Kansas and Wynnewood, Oklahoma have a combined capacity of approximately 206,500 barrels per day ("bpd").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In April 2022, CVR Energy converted its Wynnewood refinery's hydrocracker to a renewable diesel unit ("RDU") with a nameplate capacity of 252,000 bpd, which RDU is also capable of being returned to hydrocarbon service.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition to the use of third-party pipelines for the supply of crude oil, CVR Energy has an extensive gathering

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: system consisting of logistics assets that are owned, leased or part of a joint venture operation.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Petroleum refining product yield includes gasoline, diesel fuel, pet coke and other refined products such as natural gas liquids, asphalt and jet fuel among other products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Customers for the refining business primarily include retailers, railroads, farm cooperatives and other refiners/marketers.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The refining business's top customer represented 13% of its net sales for the years ended December 31, 2024 and its top two customers represented 27% and 25% of its net sales for the years ended December 31, 2023 and 2022.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Partners produces and distributes nitrogen fertilizer products, which are used by farmers to improve the yield and quality of their crops.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The principal products are UAN and ammonia.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Partners' Coffeyville, Kansas facility uses pet coke to produce nitrogen fertilizer and is supplied by its adjacent crude oil refinery pursuant to a renewable long-term agreement with CVR Energy, as well as by third parties.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Historically, the Coffeyville nitrogen fertilizer plant has obtained the remainder of its pet coke requirements from third parties such as other Midwestern refineries or pet coke brokers at spot-prices.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Partners' East Dubuque, Illinois facility uses natural gas to produce nitrogen fertilizer.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The East Dubuque facility is able to purchase natural gas at competitive prices due to its connection to the Northern Natural Gas interstate pipeline system, which is within one mile of the facility, and a third-party owned and operated pipeline.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Retailers and distributors are the main customers for UAN, and more broadly, the industrial and agriculture sectors are the recipients of its ammonia products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Partners' top customer represented 14% of its net sales for the year ended December 31, 2024 and its top two customers represented 25% and 30% of its net sales for the years ended December 31, 2023 and 2022, respectively.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Environmental Regulations CVR Energy's businesses are subject to extensive and frequently changing federal, state and local, environmental, health and safety laws and regulations governing the emission, discharge, transportation, storage, handling, use, treatment, disposal and release of regulated materials, substances or wastes, including waste-water and storm water, petroleum, renewable and nitrogen products, gasoline, diesel fuels, renewable fuels, UAN and ammonia.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: These laws and regulations and the enforcement thereof impact CVR Energy's businesses and their operations by imposing:

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: ● restrictions on operations or the need to install and operate enhanced or additional control and monitoring equipment;

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: ● liability for the investigation and remediation of contaminated environmental medial, including soil and groundwater on, in, at, under or from current and former facilities (if any) and for off-site waste disposal locations; and

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: ● specifications for the products marketed by the petroleum, renewables and the nitrogen fertilizer businesses, primarily gasoline, diesel and aviation fuels, renewable diesel, UAN and ammonia.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy's operations require numerous permits, licenses and authorizations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Failure to comply with these permits, licenses, authorizations, or environmental, health and safety laws, rules and regulations could result in fines, penalties or other sanctions or liabilities or a revocation of CVR Energy's permits, licenses or authorizations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, the laws, rules, and regulations to which CVR Energy is subject to are often evolving and many of them have or could become more stringent or have or could become subject to more stringent interpretation or enforcement by federal, state or local agencies or courts.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: These laws and regulations could result in increased capital, operating and compliance costs.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: CVR Energy's businesses are also subject to, or impacted by, various other environmental laws and regulations such as the federal Clean Air Act, the federal Clean Water Act, the federal Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Act (CERCLA), the federal Resource Conversation and Recovery Act (RCRA), federal release reporting requirements relating to the release of hazardous substances into the environment, certain fuel regulations, renewable fuel standards, as discussed below, and various other laws and regulations.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Renewable Fuel Standard CVR Energy's subsidiaries, Coffeyville Resource Refining & Marketing, LLC ("CRRM") and Wynnewood Refining Company, LLC ("WRC" and together with CRRM the "obligated-party subsidiaries") are subject to the Clean Air Act's renewable fuel standard ("RFS") which requires obligated parties whose obligations under the RFS are not otherwise waived or exempted to either blend "renewable fuels" with their transportation fuels or purchase renewable fuel credits, known as renewable identification numbers, in lieu of blending.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: See Item 1A, "Risk Factors" and Note 19, "Commitments and Contingencies," to the consolidated financial statements for further discussion.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Automotive We conduct our Automotive segment through our wholly owned subsidiaries, Icahn Automotive Group LLC ("Icahn Automotive") and AEP PLC LLC ("AEP PLC").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Automotive segment is headquartered in Bala Cynwyd, Pennsylvania.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Automotive segment is engaged in providing a full range of automotive repair and maintenance services, along with the sale of any installed parts or materials related to automotive services ("Automotive Services") to its customers, as well as sales of automotive aftermarket parts and retailed merchandise ("Aftermarket Parts").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition to its primary businesses, the Automotive segment leases available and excess real estate in certain locations under long-term operating leases.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: On January 31, 2023, a subsidiary of Icahn Automotive, IEH Auto Parts Holding LLC and its subsidiaries (collectively "Auto Plus"), an Aftermarket Parts distributor held within our Automotive segment, filed voluntary petitions (the "Chapter 11 Cases") in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of Texas (the "Bankruptcy Court").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As a result of Auto Plus' filings for bankruptcy protections on January 31, 2023, we no longer controlled the operations of Auto Plus, and therefore, we deconsolidated Auto Plus as of January 31, 2023.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: See Note 3, "Subsidiary Bankruptcy and Deconsolidation", for a detailed discussion of the Auto Plus bankruptcy and deconsolidation.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our Automotive segment's net sales for the years ended December 31, 2024, 2023 and 2022 represented approximately 10%, 9% and 13%, respectively, of our consolidated net sales.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Products, Services and Customers The automotive aftermarket industry is in the mature stage of its life cycle.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Over the past decade, consumers have moved away from do-it-yourself (retail) toward do-it-for-me (services) due to increasing vehicle complexity and electronic content, as well as decreasing availability of diagnostic equipment and know-how.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Automotive segment seeks to provide (i) an extensive selection of product offerings, (ii) competitive pricing, (iii) exceptional in-store service experience, and (iv) superior delivery to its customers.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Suppliers The Automotive segment purchases parts from manufacturers and other distributors for sale in the aftermarket.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Purchases are made based on current inventory or operational needs and are fulfilled by suppliers within short periods of time.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: During 2024, the Automotive segment's ten largest suppliers accounted for approximately 89% of the merchandise purchased and its two largest suppliers accounted for approximately 43% of the merchandise purchased.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The Automotive segment believes that the relationships that it has established with its suppliers are generally positive.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In the past, the Automotive segment has not experienced difficulty in obtaining satisfactory sources of supply and it believes that adequate alternative sources of supply exist, at similar cost, for the types of merchandise sold in its stores.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Other Operating Segments Food Packaging We conduct our Food Packaging segment through our majority owned subsidiary, Viskase Companies, Inc. ("Viskase").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Viskase is a producer of cellulosic, fibrous and plastic casings used to prepare and package processed meat products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Approximately 68% of Viskase's net sales during 2024 were derived from customers outside the United States.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As of December 31, 2024, we owned approximately 91% of the total outstanding common stock of Viskase.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Real Estate We conduct our Real Estate segment through various subsidiaries.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our Real Estate segment consists of investment properties which includes land, retail, office and industrial properties leased to corporate tenants, the development and sale of single-family homes and the operations of a resort and two country clubs.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Home Fashion We conduct our Home Fashion segment through our wholly owned subsidiary, WestPoint Home LLC ("WPH").

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: WPH's business consists of manufacturing, sourcing, marketing, distributing and selling home fashion consumer products.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: WPH's operations include a manufacturing and distribution facility in Chipley, Florida and a manufacturing facility in Bahrain, both of which are owned facilities.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Pharma We conduct our Pharma segment through our wholly owned subsidiary, Vivus LLC, formerly Vivus, Inc. ("Vivus"). Vivus is a specialty pharmaceutical company with two approved therapies and two product candidates in active clinical development.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Employees We have an aggregate of 37 employees at our Holding Company and Investment segment.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our other reporting segments employ an aggregate of approximately 15,000 employees, of which approximately 55% are employed within our Automotive segment, 16% are employed within our Food Packaging segment, 12% are employed within our Home Fashion segment, 11% are employed within our Energy segment and 3% or less are employed at each of our other segments.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Approximately 23% of our employees are employed internationally, primarily within our Food Packaging and Home Fashion segments.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Available Information Icahn Enterprises maintains a website at www.ielp.com.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Item 10 Directors, Executive Officers and Corporate Governance The names, offices held and ages of the directors, executive officers and certain significant employees of Icahn Enterprises G.P., Inc. ("Icahn Enterprises GP"), the general partner of Icahn Enterprises L.P. ("Icahn Enterprises") are as follows:

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Our directors are selected by Carl C. Icahn, as the controlling stockholder of Icahn Enterprises GP, and are not elected by our limited partners.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Individuals who possess characteristics that include integrity, business experience, financial acumen and leadership abilities are qualified to serve on our board of directors.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Listed below are our directors and executive officers with their biographies.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, we have summarized for each director why such director has been chosen to serve on our board of directors.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Carl C. Icahn has served as Chairman of the Board and a director of Starfire Holding Corporation, a privately-held holding company, and Chairman of the Board and a director of various subsidiaries of Starfire Holding Corporation, since 1984.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Since August 2007, through his position as Chief Executive Officer of Icahn Capital LP, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Icahn Enterprises and certain related entities, Mr. Icahn's principal occupation has been managing private investment funds, including Icahn Partners LP and Icahn Partners Master Fund LP.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Since 1990, Mr. Icahn has been Chairman of the Board of Icahn Enterprises GP, the general partner of Icahn Enterprises.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn began his career on Wall Street in 1961 and has become one of the most well-known and influential investors in America.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In 1968, he formed Icahn & Co., a securities firm that focused on arbitrage and options trading.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In 1978, he began taking very substantial and sometimes controlling positions in individual companies.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Over the years, these positions include: RJR Nabisco, Texaco, Phillips Petroleum, Western Union, Gulf & Western, Viacom, Uniroyal, Dan River, Marshall Field, E- II (Culligan and Samsonite), American Can, USX, Marvel, Revlon, ImClone, Fairmont, Kerr-McGee, Time Warner, Yahoo!, Lions Gate, CIT, Motorola, Genzyme, Biogen, BEA Systems, Chesapeake Energy, El Paso, Amylin Pharmaceuticals, Regeneron, Mylan Labs, KT&G, Lawson Software, MedImmune, Dell, Herbalife, Navistar International, Transocean, Take-Two, Hain Celestial, Mentor Graphics, Netflix, Forest Laboratories, Apple, eBay, PayPal, Hertz, AIG, Cheniere Energy, Xerox, Freeport-McMoRan, Dana, Bausch, Southwest Gas, Illumina and JetBlue.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As a leading shareholder activist, his efforts have unlocked billions of dollars of shareholder and bondholder value and have improved the competitiveness of American companies.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He and his affiliated companies currently own businesses in a wide range of industries, including real estate, oil refining and manufacturing.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Companies in which he and his affiliates currently own majority positions include CVR Energy, Viskase Companies, WestPoint Home and Pep Boys.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He and his affiliated companies also own stakes in many other public companies.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Icahn Enterprises LP is Mr. Icahn's flagship company through which he has acquired many of these positions.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn, 88, is a graduate of Princeton University, with a degree in philosophy.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He has many charitable interests, focusing primarily on medicine, education and child welfare.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He is a significant benefactor to, and serves as a trustee on the boards of, the School of Medicine and the Hospital at Mt Sinai.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He funded the Icahn Medical Institute Building at Mt.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Sinai Hospital and the Institute of Genomics, a genomics and multiscale biology research program, at the School of Medicine.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In 2012 he made a substantial pledge to the School of Medicine.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In honor and recognition of $200 million of

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: financial support by him, the School of Medicine was renamed the Icahn School of Medicine at Mt.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Sinai and the Institute of Genomics was renamed the Icahn Genomics Institute.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The School of Medicine also established an Icahn Scholars Program to attract a world-class group of physician-scientists to the School.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In the area of education, Mr. Icahn established seven Icahn Charter Schools located in The Bronx, New York, an area marked by poverty and high crime rates.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: The mission of the schools is based on the belief that all students deserve a rigorous academic program through which they will increase their capacity to learn.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: As a result, the students will graduate armed with the skills and knowledge to participate successfully in the most intense academic environments and will have a sense of personal and community responsibility.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: At Choate Rosemary Hall, a premiere boarding school located in Wallingford, Connecticut where he previously served on the board of trustees, he endowed the Icahn Scholars Program, which has awarded a large number of scholarships to underprivileged students, and funded the Carl C. Icahn Science Center, Choate Science Building designed by I.M.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Pei.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He also sponsored a genomics laboratory at Princeton University which was named the Carl C. Icahn Laboratory for Princeton University's Institute for Integrated Genomics.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn is also a Charter Member of the Nassau Hall Society, which is composed of individuals who have given $5 million or more to Princeton University.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: He has also made significant donations to the Randall's Island Sports Foundation, where he previously served as a trustee, for the construction of Icahn Stadium, a track and field stadium located on Randall's Island.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, he has served as a trustee on the board of Lincoln Center.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn brings to his role as the Chairman of the Board his significant business experience in leadership roles as director in various companies as discussed above, including certain of our subsidiaries.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: In addition, Mr. Icahn is uniquely qualified based on his historical background for creating value in companies across multiple industries.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Icahn has proven to be a successful investor over the past 40 years.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Andrew Teno has served as President and Chief Executive Officer and as a director of Icahn Enterprises since February 2024.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Prior to his appointment as President and Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Teno served as a portfolio manager at Icahn Capital LP, a subsidiary of Icahn Enterprises, since October 2020.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Teno previously worked at Fir Tree Partners, a New York based private investment firm that invests worldwide in public and private companies, real estate and sovereign debt, from 2011 to April 2020.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Prior to that, he worked at Crestview Partners from 2009 to 2011 as an associate in their private equity business, and at Gleacher Partners, a boutique mergers and acquisitions firm, from 2007 to 2009.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Teno has served as a director of Southwest Gas Holdings, Inc., an entity that purchases, distributes and transports natural gas and provides utility infrastructure services across North America, since May 2022.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Teno also previously served as a director of: Illumina, Inc. from May 2023 to May 2024; Crown Holdings Inc. from December 2022 to November 2023; FirstEnergy Corp. from March 2021 to December 2023; Herc Holdings Inc. from February 2021 to March 2023; and Cheniere Energy, Inc. from February 2021 to June 2022.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Teno received an undergraduate business degree from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania in 2007.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Ted Papapostolou has served as Chief Financial Officer of Icahn Enterprises since November 2021.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Previously, Mr. Papapostolou worked at Grant Thornton LLP in their audit practice.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Papapostolou received his M.B.A from The Peter J. Tobin College of Business at Saint John's University and his B.B.A from Frank G. Zarb School of Business at Hofstra University.

name: ICAHN ENTERPRISES L.P.
sentence: Mr. Papapostolou has served as director of Viskase Companies, Inc., since April 2020 and CVR Energy, Inc., since March 2023.

Icahn with respect to the investment strategy for Icahn Enterprises' Investment segment and with respect to capital allocation across Icahn Enterprises' various operating subsidiaries from 2017 to 2020.
